main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Spangdahlem Air Base, Germany, on February 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was observed for 6 minutes and was described as oblong and almost pure white in color., It displayed 4 different bright appearances resembling a large star without any visible trail or sound., The object was seen moving at varying speeds, sometimes above and sometimes below the cloud ceilings., It made an estimated 050 degree heading approach toward the observation tower before disappearing at a 055 degree heading., No physical evidence or logical explanation for the sighting was found by the Frankfurt Flight Service Center.
sighted object: one bright oblong object in the sky
witness description: US Air Force weather observers from the weather section of the base
